New to block themes and styling your sit: New to block themes and styling your site?
You can adjust your blocks to ensure a c: You can adjust your blocks to ensure a cohesive experience across your site — add your unique colors to a branded Button block, or adjust the Heading block to your preferred size.
You can customize your site as much as y: You can customize your site as much as you like with different colors, typography, and layouts. Or if you prefer, just leave it up to your theme to handle!
Tweak your site, or give it a whole new: Tweak your site, or give it a whole new look! Get creative — how about a new color palette for your buttons, or choosing a new font? Take a look at what you can do here.
